product_name: GOOD TO-GO Herbed Mushroom Risotto - 2 Servings
long_description: This risotto is cooked to perfection with onions in olive oil, rice, white wine, mushroom stock, basil pesto and sauteed mushrooms to create a creamy, yummy backcountry treat.
short_description: This risotto is cooked to perfection with onions in olive oil, rice, white wine, mushroom stock, basil pesto and sauteed mushrooms to create a creamy, yummy backcountry treat.
